```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(plotly)
```

## Cycling and walking in the UK

```{r}
cycling <- read.csv("data/cycling.csv")
fig <- plot_ly(cycling, x = ~year, y = ~once_per_month, name = "Once a month", type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines')
fig %>%
  add_trace(y = ~once_per_week, name = 'Once a week', mode = 'lines') %>%
  layout(title = "Percentage of adults in the UK who do any cycling or walking",
         xaxis = list(title = "Year"),
         yaxis = list(title = "%"))
```
